title: Southwest Airlines CEO Gary Kelly to Leave Post in February
sub_head: Kelly, who has served as CEO since 2004, will be succeeded by Robert Jordan
body:
Breaking News
Southwest Airlines Co. said Chief Executive Gary Kelly will step down as CEO in February.
Mr. Kelly, who has served as CEO since 2004, will be succeeded by Robert Jordan, executive vice president of corporate services.
Mr. Kelly will become executive chairman in February and plans to serve in that role through at least 2026 at the discretion of the companyâ€™s board, Southwest said.
(More to come)
